Text: is this the film when gwyneth paltrow and isabella rossellini get it on with each other on the beach and the tide is going over their naked bodies as they embrace and joaquin phoenix steps over the sand dunes and hes like "yeah baby"....is this it or have i picked up the plot wrong ?
nothing like it, long slow story about people with issues... not bad, good play but you need to be in that sort of thing. all the best to all
